title: Christ Is the World's Light

lyrics.text:
Christ is the world's light, Christ and none other; born in our darkness, he became our brother.
If we have seen him, we have seen the Father: Glory to God on high!

Christ is the world's peace, Christ and none other; no one can serve him and despise another.
Who else unites us, one with God the Father? Glory to God on high!

Christ is the world's life, Christ and none other; sold once for silver, murdered here, our brother.
He who redeemed us, reigns with God the Father: Glory to God on high!

author: Fred Pratt Green (1968)
